alert.note: Alert for Del Norte Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 08 at 2:09PM PST until March 10 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING ABOVE 2500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 2500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 12 inches possible with local amounts up to feet at the higher elevations. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Del Norte Interior County. * WHEN...From late Thursday night through Friday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will start at the valley floors rising over 4000 feet by Thursday afternoon. These will start to drop again Thursday night dropping to 2500 feet by Friday morning.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
